Question: Following her idol Jean Harlow, she decided to choose her mother's maiden name of this person.
Hints: This person was initially hesitant because Marilyn was the contraction of the name Mary Lynn, a name she did not like.
This person was invited to spend the weekend with Lyon and his wife Bebe Daniels at their home.
Lyon, however, felt that the name "this person" was sexy, had a "nice flow", and would be "lucky" due to the double "M".
